00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00041 
00042 class Pmacct extends Model
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'pmacctd';
00045     public $User= 'root';
00046     
00047     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/sbin/pmacctd -v 2>&1';
00048     
00049     function Pmacct()
00050     {
00051         global $TmpFile;
00052         
00053         parent::Model();
00054     
00055         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00056             $this->Commands,
00057             array(
00058                 'SetIf'=>   array(
00059                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME),
00060                     'desc'  =>  _('Set pmacct if'),
00061                     ),
00062                 
00063                 'SetNet'=>  array(
00064                     'argv'  =>  array(IPRANGE),
00065                     'desc'  =>  _('Set pmacct net'),
00066                     ),
00067                 )
00068             );
00069     }
00070 
00071     function GetVersion()
00072     {
00073         return $this->RunShellCommand($this->VersionCmd.' | /usr/bin/head -2 | /usr/bin/tail -1');
00074     }
00075 
00076     function Start()
00077     {
00078         global $TmpFile;
00079 
00080         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/pmacctd -f /etc/pmacct/pmacctd-pnrg.conf > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00081         $retval_pnrg= parent::Start();
00082         
00084         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/pmacctd -f /etc/pmacct/pmacctd-protograph.conf > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00085         $retval_protograph= parent::Start();
00086 
00087         // Second Start() needs special treatment due to pmacct not reporting conf file in ps output
00088         if ($retval_protograph) {
00090             $errout= $this->GetFile($TmpFile, '');
00091             ViewError($errout);
00092         }
00093 
00094         return ($retval_pnrg & $retval_protograph) && ($errout === '');
00095     }
00096 
00097     function SetIf($if)
00098     {
00099         $re= '|^(\s*interface:\s*)(\w+\d+)(\s+)|ms';
00100         $retval=  $this->ReplaceRegexp('/etc/pmacct/pmacctd-pnrg.conf', $re, '${1}'.$if.'${3}');
00101         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp('/etc/pmacct/pmacctd-protograph.conf', $re, '${1}'.$if.'${3}');
00102 
00103         return $retval;
00104     }
00105     
00106     function SetNet($net)
00107     {
00108         global $Re_Net;
00109         
00110         $re= "|(\s+src\s+net\s+)($Re_Net)(\s+)|ms";
00111         $retval=  $this->ReplaceRegexp('/etc/pmacct/pmacctd-pnrg.conf', $re, '${1}'.$net.'${3}');
00112         
00113         $re= "|(\s+dst\s+net\s+)($Re_Net)(\s+)|ms";
00114         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp('/etc/pmacct/pmacctd-pnrg.conf', $re, '${1}'.$net.'${3}');
00115         
00116         return $retval;
00117     }
00118 }
